description:
Reduce your reliance on animal products and plastics while you reduce chalk on your holds. This brush is made completely from sustainable materials: the handle is bamboo and the bristles are made from the Agave plant.

  • Durable laminated bamboo handle withstands hard brushing
  • Dense Tampico fibre bristles stand up to a lot of use
name: Midnight Lightning Vegan Eco-Brush
